message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I believe I can come to an agreement closer to my valuation of the product. I am willing to pay $110 for the item.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $110 is too low for me. How about $125?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $115 for the item.
